Team fortress 2... what can i say, between players that just installed the game, onto veterans with thousands of hours, even with all its flaws its a game to experience, i know the start is rough with all the "f2p's are bad" but if you can go through that, you're gonna see its charm in time.
I hope you have fun playing :)

A well made shooter with 9 classes unique in combat and personality. With stunning cartoon graphics immersive and fun balanced gameplay. To community maps and modes and of course the hats everybody likes hats this is a shooter played casually and competitively throughout the huge community tf2 is one of the most well done first person shooter games ever created.
Lots of different game play. Jungle Inferno and the new Weapons. 9/10 due to Pyro Infestation during the first dew days of the update.

The pinnacle of first person shooters. By far one of my favorite game of all time, it never gets old even after all these years.

Zdecydowanie jest to jeden z najlepszych tytułów free-to-play. Ciekawa, komiksowa grafika umila rozgrywkę. Klasy postaci są zróżnicowane co sprawia, że nie będziemy się nudzić. Bardzo dobre jest również to, że TF2 to nie gra pay-to-win. Polecam.

This game is so much fun with friends.
Every time you load the game you will always meet new and amazing people the community is great it's filled with the most kindest people ever (apart from some)

The hats are amazingly designed i love the unusual hats because they have such a good look to the wearers hat.

The weapons are balanced.

If you ever want someone to main, go medic or scout because people will always congratulate you for your  hard work (this works most on MVM)

This game never needs to change because it will always be good in my eyes,
Love the game Team fotress is better then overwacth gaben your god thank ye =p

Es un buen juego pero no me gusta algunas cosas como el desbalance de algunas partia de que te toca jugar 10 vs 3 o que te meta partidas acabadas eso es lo unico que no me agrada del juego por lo demas esta bien. :D

Un juego muy destacable que ha sabido persisitir por los multiplas años que supo pasar desde su fecha de lanzamiento, lo recomendaria por su divertido gameplay y mecanicas nuevas a las que un jugador casual de fps no esta acostumbrado, demasiado tiempo va a pasar hasta que no quieras jugar, extremadamente recomendable juego. :D
